meanings.definition: The quality or state of being warmhearted.
meanings.sent1: Her warmheartednesses shone through when she helped the lost puppy.
meanings.sent2: The community was known for its warmheartednesses towards newcomers.
meanings.sent3: His warmheartednesses was so evident that even the grumpy neighbor couldn't resist smiling.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of coldness, her warmheartednesses was like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The warmheartednesses of the elderly couple made everyone feel loved and cared for.

meanings.definition: Acts or expressions of kindness and compassion.
meanings.sent1: The warmheartednesses of the volunteers touched the hearts of many in need.
meanings.sent2: She showed her warmheartednesses by donating to the local charity.
meanings.sent3: The warmheartednesses of the clown at the party brought laughter to all.
meanings.sent4: His warmheartednesses was a beacon of hope in times of despair.
meanings.sent5: The warmheartednesses of the nurse comforted the patients during their stay.
